constructor.details: Sets the correct instance of ContractManager so that the contract may be able to call functions from other     contracts

params._manager: The address of the instance of ContractManager

distributeToAll(uint256).details: Allows the government to distribute cubits to all citizens and business owners registered in the system

params._amount: the amount of cubits to give to EACH of the users

distributeToUsers(address[],uint256).details: Allows the government to distribute cubits to a specific set of users

params._amount: the amount of cubits to give to EACH of the users
params._to: An array containing the addresses of the users to whom send cubits

isGovernment(address).details: Returns true if the given user is the government

params._user: The address of the user to check
